name: Curse of Two Halves
description:
Made for the Benbonk game jam 2021

WASD to move

Space to jump

An undead monster will follow your every move because an evil wizard had put a curse on you.

Music is not made by me:

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-haunted-house-theme

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-the-hero

https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-victory-loop

Sound Effects are from this pack:

https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
